Usage: apic {{props:delete}} OPTIONS NAME ...

  Delete one or more service properties

  Options
    -r, --{{remote}}                     use the remote app target (defaults to local)
    -S, --{{service}} SERVICE_NAME       service name
    -o, --{{organization}} ORGANIZATION  provider organization
    -s, --{{server}} SERVER              server endpoint host

  Delete a property of the LoopBack application service
    {{$ apic props:delete prop1}}
    [{{climbon}}] Deleted prop1: value1

  Delete a property of the LoopBack application service explicitly
    {{$ apic props:delete --service climbon prop1}}
    Deleted prop1: value1

  Delete a property of the {{Micro Gateway}} service
    {{$ apic props:delete --service climbon-gw prop1}}
    Deleted prop1: value1

  Delete a properties of the remote application
    {{$ apic props:delete --remote --service climbon --organization climbon --server mgmnthost.com prop1}}
    Deleted prop1: value1
